name: Sun's Dojo
description:
Platform fighter demo created for GB Compo 21! Fight your opponent until one is left standing. Created using GBDK 2020 and designed for the Nintendo Gameboy.

 Play through three modes:

  • Fight: Battle against the CPU
  • Targets: Hit as many targets as you can!
  • Practice: Knock the ball around and get a feel for the controls!

Controls:

Arrow KeysMove the PlayerAJumpA + DOWNDodge RollBAttackSTARTPauseSELECTReturn to Title

Use directional inputs to change your attacks! Juggle your opponent for the most damage!

Game still in development! Check back for more information!
